meanings.definition: The state or quality of being deciduous.
meanings.sent1: The deciduousnesses of the trees in autumn is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The deciduousnesses of the forest create a colorful landscape in the fall.
meanings.sent3: The deciduousnesses of the trees make them look like they are changing clothes for the season.
meanings.sent4: The deciduousnesses of the leaves symbolize nature's cycle of renewal.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the deciduousnesses of the trees as a sign of change and growth.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of shedding leaves annually.
meanings.sent1: In autumn, the deciduousnesses of the trees bring about a carpet of leaves.
meanings.sent2: The deciduousnesses of the maple tree make it lose its leaves every fall.
meanings.sent3: The deciduousnesses of the forest floor in fall make it perfect for jumping in leaf piles.
meanings.sent4: The deciduousnesses of the trees remind us of the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The deciduousnesses of the oak tree mark the changing seasons with their falling leaves.

meanings.definition: The act of losing leaves in the fall.
meanings.sent1: The deciduousnesses of the trees in autumn signal the start of winter.
meanings.sent2: The deciduousnesses of the forest in fall create a rustling sound.
meanings.sent3: The deciduousnesses of the trees in autumn make them look like they are shedding tears.
meanings.sent4: The deciduousnesses of the leaves falling symbolize nature's preparation for winter.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the deciduousnesses of the trees as a farewell to summer.
